dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 3453 IH: Federal Home Loan Bank Product Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. David Scott of Georgia (for himself and Mr. Lucas) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To clarify the regulatory treatment of Federal Home Loan Bank products.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Federal Home Loan Bank Product Act.

section.header: Treatment of Federal home loan bank products

subsection.text: Section 1a(2) of the Commodity Exchange Act (7 U.S.C. 1a(2)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (C), by striking the period and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: is the Federal Housing Finance Agency for any Federal Home Loan Bank (as defined in section 2 of the Federal Home Loan Bank Act).

subsection.text: Section 402(a) of the Legal Certainty for Bank Products Act of 2000 (7 U.S.C. 27(a)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking or at the end of paragraph (6);
by striking the period at the end of paragraph (7) and inserting ; or; and
by adding at the end the following:
any Federal Home Loan Bank (as defined in section 2 of the Federal Home Loan Bank Act).
